entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as having a tight grip on Harry's arm. She nods again and lets go when Harry raises his eyebrows at her.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as losing feeling in his fingers due to Hermione's tight grip on his arm. He raises his eyebrows at her and she nods again.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is described as lying on a magnificent four-poster bed with dusty hangings, purring loudly at the sight of Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: the staircase
entities.description: The staircase is described as crumbling and covered in a thick layer of dust except for the floor where a wide shiny stripe has been made by something being dragged upstairs.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are described as creeping out into the hall and up the staircase together, indicating that they are accompanying each other.
Harry encounters Crookshanks on a magnificent four-poster bed with dusty hangings, purring loudly at the sight of them.
Hermione is accompanying Harry as they creep out into the hall and up the staircase together.
